Dear Bernardina

I let Casaca come to write to you on his behalf from here, but I have decided to take him along.

Send me through Vicente 2 pieces of yellow cloth. Regards to all our people and hugs to our children. Rest assured that I am not heading to Rio, and that soon I will proceed to the Assembly; goodbye, see you soon.

Yours: (a) Almeida.
